author: dirkx
msg: Reduce the WARNING to a DEBUG when SNI support is enabled.
This is because a) during SNI such is normal and b) regardless
when overlap is detected there will always be a warning:
[warn] Init: Name-based SSL virtual hosts only work for clients
with TLS server name indication support (RFC 4366)
at the end of the cycle.

author: cziegeler
msg: Job topic and id together form a unique identifier.

author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-177: Improvements to the event and job handling:
- Adding a retry count and retry delay for jobs
- Use separate write queue for minimum delay between publishing and storing
- Improve parallel job processing, only jobs of same type are now serialized, everything else runs in parallel.

author: robbinspg
msg: TUSCANY-2041 null extended primitive types cause parsing failure
The logic in SDOSAX2Parser when encountering an end element tag is incorrect.
In the case of an extended primitive type a new DO is created but this is not popped off the stack when we hit the end element tag.
